name: Grook
description:
Grook is a platformer involving gravity and hooks. Something fishy is going on with which way is down...

Controls:
A and D to move left and right, Space to jump (hold for higher jump).
Click and hold to shoot a hook, release the mouse to release the hook.
You can jump to disconnect from the hook, or once in mid-air after you have released it.

This is my first game jam, so I'm super interested in hearing feedback from y'all! I hope it was an interesting concept. I hope it's about the right level of difficulty and it's not too hard to learn.
